name: Atlas Treeline Elektra Snowshoes - Women's
description: Tackle your favourite hikes all winter long. Lightweight, smooth-striding suspension moves naturally under your feet, and heel riser bars give your calves a break on steep sections. Sharp steel toe and aft heel crampons bite into crunchy snow for confidence and grip. When it’s time to set out, the comfortable padded bindings tighten with one pull so you don’t waste time getting to fresh tracks in powder-filled forests.Women's specific aluminum Reactiv™ frame changes shape for greater stiffness where you need it.Nytex decking resists abrasion, withstands cold temperatures and sheds snow.Spring-loaded suspension holds the snowshoes close underfoot to move freely, absorb impact, and flex naturally.All-Trac™ crampons have wider traction tabs on the sides and corners in addition to the sharp points on the front and rear.Wrapp™ Swift bindings have comfortable EVA padding and easy-to-use cinch straps.Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill.
